tasks.title: Ensure proptest is properly configured in Cargo.toml
tasks.description: Verify proptest is properly configured in Cargo.toml dev-dependencies. Ensure it's available for all test modules and properly set up.
tasks.details:
## Context

The project uses proptest for property-based testing, which is the leading and most flexible property-based testing library for Rust. We need to ensure proptest is properly configured and available for all test modules.

## Requirements

- Verify `proptest = "1.4"` is in dev-dependencies
- Ensure proptest is available for all test modules
- Verify the dependency compiles correctly
- Ensure proptest features are properly configured if needed

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] proptest is confirmed in Cargo.toml dev-dependencies
- [ ] `cargo check` runs successfully
- [ ] `bin/pre-commit` runs successfully (all checks pass)
tasks.testStrategy:
- [ ] proptest is confirmed in Cargo.toml dev-dependencies
- [ ] `cargo check` runs successfully
- [ ] `bin/pre-commit` runs successfully (all checks pass)

tasks.title: Convert tests in consumer.rs to proptest
tasks.description: Rewrite all tests in src/consumer.rs to use proptest for property-based testing instead of the current test implementation. Each test should be converted to use proptest's property testing macros and generators.
tasks.details:
## Context

The file src/consumer.rs contains tests that need to be converted to use proptest for comprehensive property-based testing. We need to convert all existing tests to use proptest for better test coverage and more thorough testing.

## Requirements

- Convert all #[test] and #[tokio::test] functions to use proptest
- Use proptest generators for test data generation
- Maintain test coverage of all existing functionality
- Ensure async tests work correctly with proptest
- Replace any proptest usage with proptest equivalents

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All tests in src/consumer.rs use proptest
- [ ] All existing test functionality is preserved
- [ ] Tests compile and run successfully
- [ ] `bin/pre-commit` runs successfully (all checks pass)
tasks.testStrategy:
- [ ] All tests in src/consumer.rs use proptest
- [ ] All existing test functionality is preserved
- [ ] Tests compile and run successfully
- [ ] `bin/pre-commit` runs successfully (all checks pass)
